articles.title: ‘We are taxpaying citizens’: Stranded Indian-Australians despair over flight caps - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Both Aakansha and Kiruthika are Australian citizens who went to India to care for critically ill parents who have since died. With new caps on overseas arrivals, they don’t know when they’ll be able to come home.
articles.content:
People are so over waiting for these flights, and for things to happen, he said.

articles.title: South Australia to host trial halving quarantine period for vaccinated returned travellers - ABC News
articles.description: The Prime Minister announced that South Australia will host a trial of halving the quarantine period for vaccinated travellers but the SA Premier says the details are yet to be finalised.
articles.content:
South Australia could introduce shorter quarantine periods, at home, for returning international travellers, if they are vaccinated.
